title: Jonas Neubert
text:
Jonas Neubert is a research intern at Neuropsychology and Psychopharmacology research department of the Faculty of Psychology and Neuroscience at Maastricht University.
You can reach me at jonas at neubert dot eu

title: Jonas Neubert
text:
Education
M.Sc. Research Master in Cognitive and Clinical Neuroscience - Specialisation: Drug Development and Neurohealth | Maastricht University, Netherlands | Sept 2021 - August 2023
B.A. Liberal Arts and Sciences | University College Maastricht, Maastricht University, Netherlands** | Sept 2016 - August 2021

title: Jonas Neubert
text:

Participatory Advisory Council | MIND Foundation | 2021 - 2022
